inclusion.criterion: Patient diagnosed with a solitary benign or malignant neoplasm localized in the right
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Computed Tomography of the abdomen with contrast shows the presence of a distended appendix with thickened appendiceal wall without perforation, abscess or gangrene.

inclusion.criterion: Patients who give written informed consent
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: She is a candidate for laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.

exclusion.criterion: scheduled need for synchronous intra-abdominal surgery;
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: preoperative evidence of invasion of adjacent structures, as assessed by CT or ultrasonography;
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has abdominal pain and leukocytosis. Computed Tomography of the abdomen with contrast shows a distended appendix.
